title: Ranked results need to be changed
body:
Currently the result of MMR is changed by win/loss of a game, as is LP.

I think it should be more heavily based off individual performance rather than the result of others affecting your own.

A soldier does not win a war, an army does. Currently I am being told I am the only soldier in the war and if the war is won i get LP/MMR and if the war is lost i lose LP/MMR. If that sounds wrong then maybe the message being sent out about ranked has to be changed, or the actual results of the game have to be changed.

I would recommend using the current grading system to determine point gain/loss while a better system is worked on.
